backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing Wall of Fame entries with add, count, list, and ID-generation functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent changes of numerous frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component controlling the intro, game, outro, and hall-of-fame phase transitions.
frontend/src/components/WallOfFameLink.t: Small button component fixed in the corner that triggers navigation to the Wall of Fame.
frontend/src/content/story.ts: Defines structured story steps, text blocks, and narrative content for the intro flow.
frontend/src/features/game/CollectiblesH: HUD component showing collected vs total stars using an icon and styled counter.
frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx: Main game component managing canvas rendering, movement, collisions, collectibles, modals, audio, and transitions.
frontend/src/features/game/GoalsModal.ts: Modal explaining Barnabus's goals with Escape‑to‑dismiss and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/game/jokes.ts: Exports a small list of goal-themed joke strings.
frontend/src/features/game/MobilePhoneMo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/game/passability.t: Provides utilities to compute corridor channel AABBs and detect obstacle intersections for guaranteed passability.
frontend/src/features/game/SpeechBalloon: Renders a clamped speech balloon with a dynamically positioned tail based on canvas bounds.
frontend/src/features/game/StarPickupMod: Displays a modal for star pickups with optional completion message and Escape-to-dismiss behavior.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: Implements a requestAnimationFrame game loop hook that reports delta time to an update callback.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameplayAu: Manages background music and star-collection audio, pausing and resuming music with deterministic timing.
frontend/src/features/game/useKeyboardCo: Tracks arrow-key movement and handles space/J actions with disable support and event cleanup.
frontend/src/features/game/worldMap.ts: Generates a random corridor path, exposes corridor checks, and defines world obstacle/map structures.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/certi: Loads pdf-lib from CDN and generates a certificate PDF with the user’s name and a styled Key Takeaways page.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/HallO: Fetches and displays Wall of Fame entries with certificate download, refresh, and optional back-navigation.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/sanit: Converts a name into a safe, ASCII filename by replacing invalid characters and trimming underscores.
frontend/src/features/intro/GoalStickine: Renders an interactive slider question with feedback and delayed continue flow.
frontend/src/features/intro/introBackgro: Generates dynamic gradient backgrounds that darken over steps and exposes constants for intro progression.
frontend/src/features/intro/IntroFlow.ts: Manages the multi-stage intro story flow with timed text reveals, gradient transitions, and navigation to the next steps.
frontend/src/features/outro/NameSubmissi: Displays a modal for entering and submitting a player name with validation, errors, and skip options.
frontend/src/features/outro/OutroFlow.ts: Controls the outro narrative flow, revealing text blocks, takeaways, and triggering name submission and completion logic.
frontend/src/features/outro/TakeawayModa: React modal component that displays a takeaway by title, handles closing via button, overlay, or Escape key, and fetches content from TAKEAWAYS.
frontend/src/features/outro/takeawaysCon: Defines the structure and list of takeaway items with titles, bodies, and optional links used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and persisted identity loading via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPlayerId: Manages a persistent player ID and completion flag using localStorage with helpers to set, clear, and update values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react‑query hooks for fetching and adding Wall of Fame entries using the backend actor with auto‑refetch behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables, themes, animations, and utility classes for the app’s design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing react‑query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with plugin integration.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current state, version, and a detailed list of implemented intro flow, narrative, UI, and progression features. Contains metadata for gating logic, timed reveals, content modeling, and completed finale and Hall of Fame flow.
